Vivant Skincare 9% Mandelic Acid 3-in-1 Toner

Brand: Vivant

Category: Toners/Astringents

Ingredients: Alcohol Denat., Water, Propylene Glycol, Mandelic Acid, Hamamelis Virginiana (Witch Hazel) Extract, Polysorbate 20.

Directions: Moisten a cotton pad with a small amount of tonic and wipe over face, neck, and d collet .

Ingredient concerns: MOD
edient concerns: MODERATE: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity, Use Restrictions
